default.query:
SELECT p.id, CONCAT(gst_number, '-', registered_business_name) AS registered_business_name FROM 
    partner p 
LEFT JOIN 
    partner_has_user phu ON phu.partner_id = p.id
LEFT JOIN 
    user_performs_role upr ON upr.user_id = phu.user_id 
LEFT JOIN 
    user u ON u.id = phu.user_id    
    group by p.id , u.id HAVING 
    (SUM(CASE WHEN upr.role_id = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0) 
    OR 
    (COUNT(upr.user_id) = 0)
